get.description: Generate a non-expiring JWT for testing/development purposes.
Get comprehensive financial summary for leases. Returns rent and utility balances, payments, and property information. Use leaseStatus parameter to filter by lease status (active, expired).
Get financial timeline for dashboard with configurable filters. Returns all financial events (rent due, expenses, payments) organized chronologically with month dividers.
List all expenses with unit information. Supports filtering by leaseId and status.

post.description: Create a new lease and link it to specified tenants.

get.description: List all leases with unit and tenant information.

put.description: Update an existing lease information. Cannot add/remove tenants.

post.description: Create a new payment record and update related status.

get.description: List all payment records with associated unit and lease details.
List all rent due records with unit and tenant information. Supports filtering by leaseId and status.

post.description: Create a new rent increase record.

get.description: List all rent increase records with unit information.
List all tenants with their associated unit number (if any).
List all units with their basic information.
